= An Example for the usage of the --call-cmd switch =

[http://code.google.com/p/gastify/source/browse/trunk/extras/callscript.php Here] is a script which has to be installed on a webserver.
Fill out the variables on top of the script and use it like this:

{{{ gastify -dc "curl http://webserver/path/to/callscript.php?number=" }}}
